1.content:
It had been a pretty normal Friday. Danny was a bit tired and was taking a shower to relax. His sister Ann had left a small chunk of soap on the floor though, and Danny, slipped and fell.

"Shit!" Danny screamed as fe fell. Luckily, his hand had grabbed on to the soap holder, and Danny's head had just barily avoided contact with the floor. "Damn it Anna." Danny said as he got up. Once the shower ended, Danny noticed something. there was a tile dislodged from the rest... "That must of happened when I tried to get some thing to hold onto while I was falling..." Danny said. He dried off, put on his boxers and fiddled with the tile. he managed to get it of. "Sorry Dad..." but then he found a small hole behind it, and inside there was a silver tube. Danny pulled it out and found the tube was actulay holding something inside it. Danny walked to the counter and opened the tube, out came a remot and an instruction booklet.

"What? Remote of Swap." Having been on Writing.com befroe Danny didn't know what to expect so he...

He wanted to take on the world. He was a girl now, had a car, and enough money to sustain himself for a bit, everything he needed to use this opportunity to try some new things. Danny sat down on "her" bed, put on a pair of black heels ( http://www.halloweenplayground.com/image... ), grabbed his purse, and headed downstairs.

"By Mom. Hanging with my friends today!" He yelled as he walked out the door.

"By back by Six, Brittany!" His mom responded. It felt so weird to be called Brittany. He got into Brittany's car and drove off.

A few moments later, he arrived at a local Cafe. He parked the car and walked over to the table which had some girls Danny remembered Brittany hanging out with before, an African American named Bria, a Latino girl named Anay, and a Caucasian brunette with blonde bangs named Michelle. "Hi girls" he said walking up to them.

"Hey Brit." They replied in unison. Just before he sat down, Danny noticed the very evident ten in Brittany's black shorts. These girl's dont even notice when there friend has a boner? This remote works wonders, Danny thought.

She bounces and squeezes them around joyfully. But after a short moment of enjoying her assets, she looks outside again to find a new target. This time she sees a female jogger passing by her house. Her ass is massive. Many men look at her ass while she passes by them. Some of them are running into each other or streetlights while staring at that jewel of an ass. Brittany just giggles as the jogger is turning around a coner where the men can't look at her. While giggling she activates her device once again to get her butt. Instantly her pants and panties begin to tighten around her butt. She takes of her pants to relief herself of that pressure. Her panties are a bit more bendier than her pants, so she lets them on. Meanwhile her butt expands to a massive, firm, and round bottom. She rubs it while enjoying the new size of it.

"Wonderful! I so sexy now!" Brittany exclaims while looking at herself in the mirror. "What now? I could give myself longer legs... or brown instead of blonde hair... or... Does this thing work with different genders? Think Brittany. What do you want next?"
15223.title: ...looks for people outside her window.

choices: Danny trys to get the remote
155.content: The remote fell out the window landing in a bush where tina found it the next day while playing outside. She brought it inside where she clicked the soul swap button at danny ,who was over there hanging out with kat, and a picture of tina in a pink and girly dress.
155.title: Reader's choice

info.brief_description: The 3rd part in the Remote of Swap saga
info.description:
Here we go again!

I'm gonna skip the small talk and get right into it.

You (Danny) 16. Shaggy dirty Blond hair and single not in good shape but not bad either.
Mom (Linda) 38. Very hot. long wavy Brown hair She looks like she never had kids. Works part time at a clothing store.
Dad (Stan) 43. Generaly musculare. Blond hair as a kid but it darkened over time. Works for some company and isnt around very often
Brittiny (Sister) 19. Single with blonde hair and DD size breasts. Goe to a university a couple hours north. Is visiting for a couple days.
Anna (Sister) 12. Short brown hair and shroter than her class mates. a bit tomboyish
As a family you get along well.

Aunt Nita, 41, Short brown hair with blond highlights Nice boobs and butt
Samantha, 15 Cousin long birty blond hair, sort of a girlier version of Danny
Veronica : 24 Nieghbor She moved here over the summer Long blond hair DD boobs and tight ass.
Kim: 24 Nieghbor rommates with Veronica Short red hair and same body as body as Veronica
Jasmine: 23 Nighbor roommates with the two above African Long Black hair CC boobs but butt as good as the others
Victoria (Neighbor) 17. long brown hair. Hot. also a cheerleader. has some of the same classes as Danny.

The fallowing live in a house across the street.
Robin: 40 short Red hair Mother of the fallowing kids. Works for the same company as Stan but is around all the time. Very motherly
Tom (brown hair) and Rachel (red hair): 18 Twins bother very athletic yet far from meatheads. Only rachel can drive, Tom failed the driver's test
Katherine "Kat": 15, mdeium length red hair only a month younger than Danny, she and him have becom good frineds since she moved here. Both are anime fans, but overbearing about it.
Tina: 9 long hair and ginger. Posslibly the girliest person Danny has ever met. Also the most shy.

Options:
Body swap: fairly self explanitory.
Body Part Swap: Swaps a singular part, or parts in pairs (amrs legs ect.)
Life Swap: Danny's physical body is maintained, but is now seen as the person swapped with
Gender Swap: Again, it obvious, but does require one boy and one girl to be sucessful strange results if otherwise.
Head Swap: Swaps the heads of the user and target. The swapped will live thier original lives, but with their new bodies, and whatever may have changed because of that.
Wardrobe swap: All clothing swaps. All of it. Adjusted to fit new user.
Age swap: Swaps the ages of 2 people
Soul Swap: Gives the user the body, and clothes of the target. (ex. Danny uses it on Brittany. He looks like her but is now Dannielle, the middle sibling of the family)
Personality Swap: Duh
Role Reversal: this is a fun one. The user is now considered the target's past persona. (Ex. Danny swaps with a bitch, and now is a version of himself if he were a mean girl, as well as dresses in said persona) Another coll effect is that you can link other swaps to this one. Wardrobe Swap + Role Reversal = the user now dresses in a similar style to the target, and vice versa.
Personal info: Brings up some things about the target: sort of a misc. option.
World Swap: Does need to be linked to another swap to work, and will take it to a global scale. Often goes as unexpected.
